headline.main: The Gift of Being Gay and a Dad

docs.abstract: When I came out, I believed I was giving up the one thing I had always wanted since I was a kid: being a dad.
docs.snippet: When I came out, I believed I was giving up the one thing I had always wanted since I was a kid: being a dad.

docs.lead_paragraph: A company with deep ties to Gov. Chris Christie dominates New Jersey’s system of large halfway houses. There has been little state oversight, despite widespread problems.

headline.seo: In New Jersey Halfway Houses, Escapees Stream Out as a Penal Business Thrives
headline.main: As Escapees Stream Out, a Penal Business Thrives
headline.print_headline: As Escapees Stream Out, A Penal Business Thrives

docs.abstract: New Jersey, grappling with crowded prisons, has become a leader in a national movement to save money by diverting inmates to a new kind of privately run halfway house; halfway houses have mutated into a shadow corrections network, where drugs, gang activity and violence often go unchecked; system is largely administered by Community Education Centers, company that has deep connections to politicians of both parties, including Gov Chris Christie (Series: Unlocked).
docs.snippet: A company with deep ties to Gov. Chris Christie dominates New Jersey’s system of large halfway houses. There has been little state oversight, despite widespread problems.

byline.contributor: Jo Craven McGinty, Sheelagh McNeill and Jack Styczynski contributed reporting.

docs.lead_paragraph: Birth photography is a small but growing profession chronicling a rite of passage no less significant than a wedding, though trickier to capture on film.

headline.seo: Now in the Delivery Room: Forceps! Camera! Action!
headline.main: Honey, the Baby Is Coming; Quick, Call the Photographer
headline.print_headline: Honey, the Baby Is Coming; Quick, Call the Photographer

docs.abstract: Birth photography is a growing profession, increasing in popularity as more couples embrace delivery as a rite of passage worth celebrating and memorializing; profession is attended by a number of specific difficulties, including photography bans in some delivery rooms.
docs.snippet: Birth photography is a small but growing profession chronicling a rite of passage no less significant than a wedding, though trickier to capture on film.

keywords.value: International Assn of Professional Birth Photographers
keywords.name: organizations

docs.lead_paragraph: Midwifery is no longer seen as a fringe practice favored by hippies, but as an enlightened, more natural birthing technique for the hip.

headline.seo: The Midwife Becomes a Status Symbol for the Hip

docs.abstract: Midwifery is no longer seen as a fringe practice, but as an enlightened, more natural choice for the journey through pregnancy and childbirth.

headline.seo: ‘See You at Harry’s,’ by Jo Knowles

headline.main: Two Women and Two Trajectories in China

docs.abstract: A photograph of a Chinese woman with a bloody, newly aborted, seven-month-old fetus has led to massive outrage over the enforcement of the state's one-child policy. But many also defend the plan's original thesis, that an unchecked birth rate would threaten the country's economic gains. As the debate rages on the ground, China has sent its first female astronaut into space.

headline.print_headline: Elation and Heartbreak on the Mountaintop

docs.lead_paragraph: A public outcry ensued when graphic photos of a 23-year-old woman and her dead fetus were posted online.

headline.seo: China Suspends Family Planning Workers After Forced Abortion
headline.main: China Suspends Family Planning Workers After Forced Abortion
headline.print_headline: China Suspends Family Planning Workers After Forced Abortion

docs.abstract: China suspends three local family planning officials in northwest China following public outcry over reports that they had forced 23-year-old Feng Jianmei to undergo an abortion seven months into her pregnancy; story received widespread attention online after the woman's husband posted graphic photos of her lying in a hospital bed with the remains of the fetus.
docs.snippet: A public outcry ensued when graphic photos of a 23-year-old woman and her dead fetus were posted online.
